item.title: Go: counting semaphores
item.description: Goroutines One of the main features of the Go programming languages is the goroutine. Executing a function as a goroutine lets us run things in parallel which can greatly improve the performance of our application. But you can take parallelism only so far before it actually starts making things slower.
